item.description:
It's Restaurant Week in Worcester! (don't worry, I didn't know there was such a thing either!) Join us we head to dinner at the delicious 111 Chophouse. This is usually an expensive restaurant, but we will be enjoying their special menu, $20.09 for a 3 course dinner!

We always have a great time, so please join us at 111 Chophouse and enjoy their delicious food. If you haven't been before, it is worth the trip to Worcester. This restaurant is terrific! Everyone pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Worcester Restaurant Week Special Dinner at 111 Chophouse, Worcester
